subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lara Gut of Switzerland made the most of good conditions to win her first World Cup downhill, while Lindsey Vonn’s bid for a fifth straight victory in speed events ended with a crash.
snippet: Lara Gut of Switzerland made the most of good conditions to win her first World Cup downhill, while Lindsey Vonn’s bid for a fifth straight victory in speed events ended with a crash.
